activities: SATMAP is a proprietary call mapping solution that uses neural network technology to map calls between call center agents and customers to maximize the chance of generating revenue, decreasing cost, or improving customer satisfaction.  SATMAP accomplishes these tasks by using detailed information about a caller and a call center’s agents, such as their  geographical location, likes, dislikes, and hobbies, to intelligently map calls so as to provide a customer with an agent who is most likely to generate a sale, keep the call short, or to attain a high level of customer satisfaction.
recoursemech: SATMAP will use the DMA Safe Harbor program as our independent recourse mechanism for dispute resolution.
